mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (content, review_score, order_id) VALUE (#{content}, ${review_score}, ${order_id})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT review_id, content, review_score, reply FROM review JOIN `order` on review.order_id = `order`.order_id WHERE Store_name LIKE ( SELECT Store_name FROM store WHERE store.user_id = #{user_id}) ) ORDERS LIMIT 2 OFFSET ${numOfPages - 2}
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET reply = #{reply} WHERE review_id = ${review_id}
